channel.title: Hosting problems
channel.description: Hey guys. ok i am trying to host on one computer and play the server on another. i've tried 127.0.0.1 which i knew wasn't going to work. then i tried the ip. neither worked. can someone tell me what to do, or what? and btw if you can host, i can make a server on your computer, so pm me and see if you can host my server. thanks.

item.title: Hosting problems
item.dc:creator: @Dopple1 Dopple™
item.description:
@Dopple1 wrote:

[quote=“Jonnydpickle, post:2, topic:333929”]1. Ur not supposed to offer to host here
2. If you could code you could fix this problem easy
3. Ur not typing in the ip correctly.[/quote]
First of all you dont need to know how to code to find out how to portforward

The real answer:
Try portforwarding correctly
and get your no-ip done
MAKE SURE YOU USE YOUR IP

Read full topic
